::Fliq/Grimmler::

Fliq stops near the bodies of Dachande and Battera, breathing 
heavily. He picks them up, slinging them over his shoulders and 
running back toward the CF.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler carefully approaches Tremmer's location, his gun ready.

"Hello?" he cautiously calls out.
